text: Ion-Marcel Ciolacu (born 28 November 1967) is a Romanian politician and Prime Minister of Romania from 15 June 2023 until 6 May 2025. He was the President of the Chamber of Deputies of the Parliament of Romania and is the leader of the Social Democratic Party. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the Chamber of Deputies (Romania)
title: Marcel Ciolacu
